content.original: The Actuator Enhancement System (AES) is a combination of finely tuned myomer bundles and an enhanced DI computer interface that can improve the workings of a BattleMech's limbs. In many ways similar to the acuity enhancing servos and mechanisms tied into enhanced targeting computers, AES components serve to stabilize subtle variances in gross 'Mech movements, which can lead to greater weapon precision or improved balance adjustments. However, the systems are heavy and bulky.
content.prevOriginal: The Actuator Enhancement System (AES) is a combination of finely tuned myomer bundles and an enhanced DI computer interface that can improve the workings of a BattleMech's limbs. In many ways similar to the acuity enhancing servos and mechanisms tied into enhanced targeting computers, AES components serve to stabilize subtle variances in gross 'Mech movements, which can lead to greater weapon precision or improved balance adjustments. However, the systems are heavy and bulky.
content.content: The Actuator Enhancement System (AES) is a combination of finely tuned myomer bundles and an enhanced DI computer interface that can improve the workings of a BattleMech's limbs. In many ways similar to the acuity enhancing servos and mechanisms tied into enhanced targeting computers, AES components serve to stabilize subtle variances in gross 'Mech movements, which can lead to greater weapon precision or improved balance adjustments. However, the systems are heavy and bulky.

content.original: This is a collection of patchwork materials (e.g. ferro-fibrous armour, endo steel structure, or ultralight composites) which provide the same degree of protection at a lighter weight, but at the cost of critical slots.
content.prevOriginal: This is a collection of patchwork materials (e.g. ferro-fibrous armour, endo steel structure, or ultralight composites) which provide the same degree of protection at a lighter weight, but at the cost of critical slots.
content.content: 这是一种拼接材料(如纤维钢装甲、内构钢或超轻复合材料),它们以较轻的重量提供相同的保护,但需要关键槽.

content.original: This is a collection of patchwork materials (e.g. ferro-fibrous armour, endo steel structure, or ultralight composites) which provide the same degree of protection at a lighter weight, but at the cost of critical slots.

content.original: The Angel ECM Suite is an advanced version of the Guardian ECM Suite operating on a broader spectrum and greatly advances ECM technology on the battlefield. Development of the Angel began in the Draconis Combine shortly after the Battle of Luthien, but despite assistance from ComStar, cost overruns and internal problems within both powers kept it in its experimental stages for a long time and delayed its widespread deployment.
content.prevOriginal: The Angel ECM Suite is an advanced version of the Guardian ECM Suite operating on a broader spectrum and greatly advances ECM technology on the battlefield. Development of the Angel began in the Draconis Combine shortly after the Battle of Luthien, but despite assistance from ComStar, cost overruns and internal problems within both powers kept it in its experimental stages for a long time and delayed its widespread deployment.
content.content: 天使ECM套件是守护者ECM套件的高级版本,在更的的范围内运行,极大地提高了战场上的ECM技术.'天使'由天龙联合体于于路德恩战役后不久开发,尽管有通讯之星的协助,成本超支和两个势力的内部问题使其长期处于试验阶段,并因此推迟了大规模部署.

content.original: The Beagle Active Probe (BAP) is a suite of enhancement technology that, when attached to general electronic sensors, enables the equipped unit to detect and classify other battlefield units whether they are camouflaged or even shut down, with the exception of conventional infantry.
content.prevOriginal: The Beagle Active Probe (BAP) is a suite of enhancement technology that, when attached to general electronic sensors, enables the equipped unit to detect and classify other battlefield units whether they are camouflaged or even shut down, with the exception of conventional infantry.
content.content: 猎兔犬主动探测器(BAP)是一套增强技术,当接入通用电子传感器时,装备的单位能够检测和区分除常规步兵外的其他战场单位,无论他们是伪装或关闭.

content.original: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.prevOriginal: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.content: 降低隐身和ECM防护单元的效果

content.original: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.prevOriginal: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.content: 提供敌军单位的详细信息

content.original: The Bloodhound Active Probe was first introduced by ComStar, using the Beagle Active Probe as a baseline for a suite of enhancement technology that, when attached to general electronic sensors, enables the equipped unit to detect and classify other battlefield units whether they are camouflaged or even shut down, with the exception of conventional infantry.
content.prevOriginal: The Bloodhound Active Probe was first introduced by ComStar, using the Beagle Active Probe as a baseline for a suite of enhancement technology that, when attached to general electronic sensors, enables the equipped unit to detect and classify other battlefield units whether they are camouflaged or even shut down, with the exception of conventional infantry.
content.content: 寻血犬主动探测器最初由通讯之星开发,以猎兔犬主动探测器作为这套增强系统的技术基础,当接入通用电子传感器,装备的单位能够检测和区分除常规步兵外的其他战场单位,无论他们是伪装或关闭.

content.original: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.prevOriginal: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.content: 降低隐身和ECM防护单元的效果

content.prevOriginal: Provides detailed information on enemy units

content.original: the Federated Commonwealth started development of the Blue Shield Particle Field Damper (PFD), a defensive system that would reduce damage from Energy Weapons. While the field damper did shield the equipped unit from Weapons fire, it was also notoriously unreliable in ground units. After roughly a minute of operation, the dust and other miscellaneous debris it sucked in began to adversely affect the operation of the damper, eventually resulting in shutdown of the system.
content.prevOriginal: the Federated Commonwealth started development of the Blue Shield Particle Field Damper (PFD), a defensive system that would reduce damage from Energy Weapons. While the field damper did shield the equipped unit from Weapons fire, it was also notoriously unreliable in ground units. After roughly a minute of operation, the dust and other miscellaneous debris it sucked in began to adversely affect the operation of the damper, eventually resulting in shutdown of the system.
content.content: 联邦开始开发蓝盾粒子场发生器(PFD),一种可以减少受到能量武器伤害的防御系统.虽然该发生器确实可以保护装备单位免受攻击,但它在地面部队中也是出了名的不可靠.大约运行一分钟后,吸入的灰尘和其他杂物开始影响风门的运行,并最终导致关机.

content.original: Blue Shield Particle Field Damper reduce Energy Damage Taken
content.prevOriginal: Blue Shield Particle Field Damper reduce Energy Damage Taken
content.content: 蓝盾粒子场发生器,降低受到的能量武器伤害.

content.original: Maintains a constant heat generation of 10.
content.prevOriginal: Maintains a constant heat generation of 10.

content.content: 突破射击, 提高精度/后座

content.original: The Boosted Beagle Active Probe removes the limiters from a Generic BAP and increases the scanning power of any unit it is attached to, but turning it on might as well be blaring ''SHOOT ME BRO I'M LOOKING FOR YOU'' on a loudspeaker.
content.prevOriginal: The Boosted Beagle Active Probe removes the limiters from a Generic BAP and increases the scanning power of any unit it is attached to, but turning it on might as well be blaring ''SHOOT ME BRO I'M LOOKING FOR YOU'' on a loudspeaker.
content.content: 增强型猎兔犬主动探测器通过从通用猎兔犬主动探测器中移除限制器,增加了它所接入的任何单位的扫描能力,但启动它意味着用扬声器在战场上大喊''快开枪打我,兄弟,我在找你''
增强型猎兔犬主动探测器
增强型猎兔犬主动探测器

content.original: The Boosted C3 unit was developed by the Federated Suns as an Answer to more emerging ECM Technologies, offering a far stronger sensor suite to lock on to targets in a wider area. Requires presence of C3 Master to oparate.
content.prevOriginal: The Boosted C3 unit was developed by the Federated Suns as an Answer to more emerging ECM Technologies, offering a far stronger sensor suite to lock on to targets in a wider area. Requires presence of C3 Master to oparate.
content.content: 超频C3网络单元由恒星联邦开发,作为对更多新型ECM技术出现的应对,提供了更强大的传感器套件,以在更大的范围内锁定目标.需要C3主机进行处理.

content.prevOriginal: Normally carried by a lance commander, the C3 Master unit offers greatly improved processing of tactical data over a standard C3 unit. This cutting edge model contains all the latest upgrades.
content.content: C3网络主机通常由小队指挥官携带,和标准C3单元相比,它拥有更高的战术数据处理能力.这种尖端模块中包含了所有最新的升级.

content.original: The C3 Slave is a computer system that shares tactical data over a Network. Weighing a single ton and carried by the members of a lance or company. Requires presence of C3 Master to oparate.

content.original: The C3i was developed by ComStar from Draconis Combine technology. While expanding its military strength to ward off the Clan Invasion, the ComGuard found their current C3 Master Computer incapable of handling the complexities of senary units.
content.prevOriginal: The C3i was developed by ComStar from Draconis Combine technology. While expanding its military strength to ward off the Clan Invasion, the ComGuard found their current C3 Master Computer incapable of handling the complexities of senary units.
content.content: C3i是通讯之星基于天龙联合体技术开发的.在扩大其军事力量以抵御氏族入侵的同时,通讯防卫队发现他们目前的C3主机无法处理复杂的老旧单位.

content.original: This basic Electronics Counter Measures scrambles Enemy Targeting and Missile Systems and is a efficient upgrade to a 'Mech's standard ECM equipment.
content.prevOriginal: This basic Electronics Counter Measures scrambles Enemy Targeting and Missile Systems and is a efficient upgrade to a 'Mech's standard ECM equipment.
content.content: 这种基本的电子对抗设备(ECM)可以干扰敌人的瞄准和导弹系统,是对机甲标准ECM设备的有效升级

content.original: This advanced Electronics Warfare Suite is designed to mimic the more advanced Star League-era ECM, Active Probe and Targeting Computer. Containing a vast Array of Electronic Warfare Systems able to efficiently jam Enemy sensors and improving their Own.
content.prevOriginal: This advanced Electronics Warfare Suite is designed to mimic the more advanced Star League-era ECM, Active Probe and Targeting Computer. Containing a vast Array of Electronic Warfare Systems able to efficiently jam Enemy sensors and improving their Own.
content.content: 这套先进电子战套件是为了模拟更先进的星联时代ECM,主动探测器和瞄准电脑.其中包含了大量电子战系统,能够有效的干扰敌方传感器并提高自身传感器效率.

content.original: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within its radius, as indicated by the spinning gold ring. Will go into cooldown state after use.
content.prevOriginal: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within its radius, as indicated by the spinning gold ring. Will go into cooldown state after use.
content.content: 主动能力(使用开火动作).对在旋转的金色圆圈范围内的所有敌人进行传感器锁定.使用后进入冷却状态.

content.original: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.prevOriginal: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.content: 降低隐身和ECM防护单元的效果

content.original: The Active Probe (AP) is your most basic battlefield probe system, allowing a battlemech's sensors to filter out and examine a wider array of information.
content.prevOriginal: The Active Probe (AP) is your most basic battlefield probe system, allowing a battlemech's sensors to filter out and examine a wider array of information.
content.content: 主动探测器(AP)是最基本的战场探测系统,允许战斗机甲传感器过滤和检查更广泛的信息.

content.original: Reduces effectiveness of stealth and ECM shielded units
content.prevOriginal: Reduces effectiveness of stealth and ECM shielded units

content.original: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.prevOriginal: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.content: 提供敌军单位的详细信息

content.original: The Guardian ECM Suite was introduced in 2597 by Johnston Industries of the Terran Hegemony. Designed to interfere with guided weaponry, targeting computers, and communication systems, the Guardian was typically used to shield allied units from such equipment by emitting a broad-band signal meant to confuse radar, infrared, ultraviolet, magscan and sonar sensors.
content.prevOriginal: The Guardian ECM Suite was introduced in 2597 by Johnston Industries of the Terran Hegemony. Designed to interfere with guided weaponry, targeting computers, and communication systems, the Guardian was typically used to shield allied units from such equipment by emitting a broad-band signal meant to confuse radar, infrared, ultraviolet, magscan and sonar sensors.
content.content: 守护者ECM套件于2597年由人类霸权的约翰斯顿工业公司推出.旨在干扰制导武器、目标电脑和通讯系统,守护者通常用发射宽频信号的方法来干扰雷达、红外、紫外、磁扫描和声呐传感器,进而保护盟友免受此类设备的影响.

content.original: HarJel is a black gel developed by Clan Diamond Shark. It is created from a naturally occurring substance, of which The Sharks vigilantly guard their virtual monopoly over. This material can be found in the Twycross system and in the Clan Homeworlds.  When Destroyed Explodes. Incompatible to Stealth, Reflective, Reactive and Lamellor Armours
content.prevOriginal: HarJel is a black gel developed by Clan Diamond Shark. It is created from a naturally occurring substance, of which The Sharks vigilantly guard their virtual monopoly over. This material can be found in the Twycross system and in the Clan Homeworlds.  When Destroyed Explodes. Incompatible to Stealth, Reflective, Reactive and Lamellor Armours
content.content: 哈杰尔是一种由钻石鲨氏族开发的黑色凝胶.它是由一种自然存在的物质制成,钻石鲨警惕的守卫着这种物质的垄断权.这种物质可以在Twycross星系和部落家园中找到.当被摧毁时会爆炸.与隐形、反射、反应和薄片装甲不兼容.

content.original: HarJel is a black gel developed by Clan Diamond Shark. It is created from a naturally occurring substance, of which The Sharks vigilantly guard their virtual monopoly over. content.original: As part of the experiments that led to Triple Strength Myomer, the NAIS and other research firms went through several prototypes. Though unsuited for combat use, there were several formulations that held promise for Industrial applications. This information, allowed IndustrialMech manufacturers to create Industrial Triple Strength Myomer which was ideally suited for loading, hauling, and other heavy lift tasks.
content.prevOriginal: As part of the experiments that led to Triple Strength Myomer, the NAIS and other research firms went through several prototypes. Though unsuited for combat use, there were several formulations that held promise for Industrial applications. This information, allowed IndustrialMech manufacturers to create Industrial Triple Strength Myomer which was ideally suited for loading, hauling, and other heavy lift tasks.
content.content: 做为三倍强化人工肌肉实验的一部分,NAIS和其他公司研究了多个原型.虽然不适合用于作战,但有几种原型有望应用在工业方面.这些原型让机甲制造商能够制造工业三倍强化人工肌肉,非常适用于装载、运输和其他繁重的托举任务.
工业三倍强化人工肌肉(TSM)

content.original: Introduced in 2740 by the Terran Hegemony, the Myomer Accelerator Signal Circuitry (MASC) is a piece of equipment that allows a BattleMech to move at twice its walking speed. However, actuators were not built for this kind of stress, and prolonged usage of MASC systems can damage the leg actuators of a BattleMech. Although this is unlikely to immobilize the BattleMech, the danger of destroyed actuators is enough for cautious warriors to limit their use in battle. Activatable: DEALS DAMAGE AND CRIT TO LEGS ON FAILURE
content.prevOriginal: Introduced in 2740 by the Terran Hegemony, the Myomer Accelerator Signal Circuitry (MASC) is a piece of equipment that allows a BattleMech to move at twice its walking speed. However, actuators were not built for this kind of stress, and prolonged usage of MASC systems can damage the leg actuators of a BattleMech. Although this is unlikely to immobilize the BattleMech, the danger of destroyed actuators is enough for cautious warriors to limit their use in battle. Activatable: DEALS DAMAGE AND CRIT TO LEGS ON FAILURE
content.content: 由人类霸权于2740引入,人工肌肉加速信号电路(MASC)是一种可以让机甲以两倍其普通行走速度移动的装备.然而腿部机构不是为这种压力制造的.长时间使用MASC系统可能会损坏机甲腿部机构.虽然这不太可能使机甲瘫痪,但腿部机构被摧毁的危险足以让机甲战士谨慎的在战斗中使用.可激活:失败时对腿部造成伤害和严重损伤.
人工肌肉加速信号电路(MASC)

content.original: Modular Armor was created as a stopgap measure by ComStar engineers while researching Hardened Armor the engineers stumbled across an ancient idea: By mounting a special frame on the unit, it could support additional armor protection on a Location beyond what the internal frame would normally allow. Cannot be used with Stealth
content.prevOriginal: Modular Armor was created as a stopgap measure by ComStar engineers while researching Hardened Armor the engineers stumbled across an ancient idea: By mounting a special frame on the unit, it could support additional armor protection on a Location beyond what the internal frame would normally allow. Cannot be used with Stealth
content.content: 模块化装甲是通讯之星工程师在研究硬化装甲时作为权宜之计创造的.工程师们偶然发现了一个古老的思路:通过在单位上安装一个特殊的框架,它可以在超出内部框架正常允许的位置提供额外的装甲保护. 不可以和隐身一起使用

content.original: Modular Armor was created as a stopgap measure by ComStar engineers while researching Hardened Armor the engineers stumbled across an ancient idea: By mounting a special frame on the unit, it could support additional armor protection on a Location beyond what the internal frame would normally allow. Cannot be used with Stealth
content.prevOriginal: Modular Armor was created as a stopgap measure by ComStar engineers while researching Hardened Armor the engineers stumbled across an ancient idea: By mounting a special frame on the unit, it could support additional armor protection on a Location beyond what the internal frame would normally allow. Cannot be used with Stealth
content.content: 模块化装甲是通讯之星工程师在研究硬化装甲时作为权宜之计创造的.工程师们偶然发现了一个古老的思路:通过在单位上安装一个特殊的框架,它可以在超出内部框架正常允许的位置提供额外的装甲保护. 不可以和隐身一起使用

content.original: Triple Strength Myomer is an experimental structural material that grants a ‘Mech more physical strength and flexibility, granting melee and movement bonuses.
content.prevOriginal: Triple Strength Myomer is an experimental structural material that grants a ‘Mech more physical strength and flexibility, granting melee and movement bonuses.
content.content: 三倍强化人工肌肉是一种实验性结构材料,赋予机甲更多的体力和灵活性,并提供近战和移动奖励.
更强的近战和更快的速度

content.original: The partial wing system offers increased jump capability. In addition, its large surface area allows a 'Mech to more efficiently radiate excess heat.
content.prevOriginal: The partial wing system offers increased jump capability. In addition, its large surface area allows a 'Mech to more efficiently radiate excess heat.
content.content: 偏翼系统提供了更高的跳跃能力.此外,其大的表面积允许机甲更有效的辐射多余热量.

content.original: The partial wing system's large surface area efficiently radiates excess heat.
content.prevOriginal: The partial wing system's large surface area efficiently radiates excess heat.
content.content: 偏翼系统的大表面积有效地散热.

content.original: The Partial Wing System increases Jump Jet jump distance by 30%
content.prevOriginal: The Partial Wing System increases Jump Jet jump distance by 30%
content.content: 这偏翼系统提升30%跳跃推进器跳跃的距离.

content.content: 这偏翼系统提升30%跳跃推进器跳跃的距离.

content.original: The partial wing system offers increased jump capability. In addition, its large surface area allows a 'Mech to more efficiently radiate excess heat. This system is extra robust for use on superheavy 'Mechs.
content.prevOriginal: The partial wing system offers increased jump capability. In addition, its large surface area allows a 'Mech to more efficiently radiate excess heat. This system is extra robust for use on superheavy 'Mechs.
content.content: 偏翼系统提供了更高的跳跃能力.此外,其大的表面积允许机甲更有效的辐射多余热量.该系统在超重型机甲上使用时非常坚固.

content.content: 这偏翼系统提升30%跳跃推进器跳跃的距离.

content.original: The PPC Capacitor is an extra component that can be added to any type of Projector Cannon. It enhances a PPC damage capabilities at the cost of higher heat generation. When Destroyed Explodes.
content.prevOriginal: The PPC Capacitor is an extra component that can be added to any type of Projector Cannon. It enhances a PPC damage capabilities at the cost of higher heat generation. When Destroyed Explodes.
content.content: 粒子炮电容器是一个额外组件,可以添加到任何类型的投射加农炮中.它以更高的发热量为代价增强的ppc的破坏力.被摧毁时会爆炸.

content.original: Maintains a constant heat generation of 10.
content.prevOriginal: Maintains a constant heat generation of 10.

content.original: Mech components are sealed inside small compartments and thick buffering material is added. This extends the time before maintenance is required, and allows extended deployments in even the worst corrosive atmospheres. This also has the positive effect of protecting vital components from the damage.
content.prevOriginal: Mech components are sealed inside small compartments and thick buffering material is added. This extends the time before maintenance is required, and allows extended deployments in even the worst corrosive atmospheres. This also has the positive effect of protecting vital components from the damage.
content.content: 机甲组件被密封在一个小的隔间内,中间添加了厚凝胶缓冲材料.这延长无需保养的时间,并增长了在最恶劣的腐蚀性环境中部署的时间.这还具有保护重要组件免受损坏的积极作用.

content.original: Remote Sensor Dispensers are small cargo bays with an attached dispenser used to place Remote Sensors. These dispensers are normally mounted on support vehicles, used to secure newly-established landing zones or defensive perimeters. Each RSD can carry up to thirty short-range sensors, typically a mix of thermal, electromagnetic and seismic sensors.
content.prevOriginal: Remote Sensor Dispensers are small cargo bays with an attached dispenser used to place Remote Sensors. These dispensers are normally mounted on support vehicles, used to secure newly-established landing zones or defensive perimeters. Each RSD can carry up to thirty short-range sensors, typically a mix of thermal, electromagnetic and seismic sensors.
content.content: 远程传感器自动安置器(RSD)是一个小型货舱,带有用于安置远程传感器的附属安置器.这些安置器通常安装在支援车辆上,用于保护新建立的着陆区或防御边界.每个RSD最多可以携带30个短程传感器,通常是热传感器、电磁传感器和地表震动传感器的组合.

content.original: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.prevOriginal: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.content: 降低隐身和ECM防护单元的效果

content.original: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.prevOriginal: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.content: 提供敌军单位的详细信息

content.original: A Searchlight hardwired into the System Comm and Sensors Array allows to easier detect and highlight nearby Targets
content.prevOriginal: A Searchlight hardwired into the System Comm and Sensors Array allows to easier detect and highlight nearby Targets
content.content: 探照灯接驳到通迅和传感器系统中,可以更容易的检测和显示附近目标.

content.original: Shows their vision when lancemates move
content.prevOriginal: Shows their vision when lancemates move
content.content: 当队友移动时显示他们的视野

content.original: Spikes have been used as decoration on BattleMechs for centuries, but had no effect in combat. The Federated Commonwealth changed that when it introduced reinforced and strengthened Spikes capable of inflicting damage on enemy units in close combat. Based on the same engineering reports that gave birth to the Lyran Commonwealth's Hatchet, these experimental melee weapons have demonstrated their effectiveness in the Solaris arenas. Effect wont stack beyond 10 pieces.
content.prevOriginal: Spikes have been used as decoration on BattleMechs for centuries, but had no effect in combat. The Federated Commonwealth changed that when it introduced reinforced and strengthened Spikes capable of inflicting damage on enemy units in close combat. Based on the same engineering reports that gave birth to the Lyran Commonwealth's Hatchet, these experimental melee weapons have demonstrated their effectiveness in the Solaris arenas. Effect wont stack beyond 10 pieces.
content.content: 几个世界以来,尖刺都是战斗机甲的装饰,但在战斗中没有任何效果.同盟国政府改变了这一点,引入了能够在近战中对敌方单位造成伤害的强化尖刺.根据创造了天琴座同盟国短柄斧的工程师报告,这些实验性近战武器证明了其在索拉里斯星域的有效性.效果最多叠加10次.

content.prevOriginal: All incoming Melee damage reduced, extra Melee Damage.
content.content: 降低即将到来的近战伤害和额外近战伤害.

content.original: The supercharger allows a 'Mech to exceed its normal engine output, increasing walk and run distance at the cost of higher heat generation. Activatable: EXPLODES ON FAILURE! Some superstitious believe it causes the common cold.
content.prevOriginal: The supercharger allows a 'Mech to exceed its normal engine output, increasing walk and run distance at the cost of higher heat generation. Activatable: EXPLODES ON FAILURE! Some superstitious believe it causes the common cold.
content.content: 增压器允许机甲超出正常发动机输出,以更高的发热为代价增加不行和冲刺的距离.可激活:故障时爆炸! 一些迷信的人认为这会导致感冒.
人工肌肉加速信号电路(MASC)

content.original: The Actuator Enhancement System (AES) is a combination of finely tuned myomer bundles and an enhanced DI computer interface that can improve the workings of a BattleMech's limbs. In many ways similar to the acuity enhancing servos and mechanisms tied into enhanced targeting computers, AES components serve to stabilize subtle variances in gross 'Mech movements, which can lead to greater weapon precision or improved balance adjustments. However, the systems are heavy and bulky.
content.prevOriginal: The Actuator Enhancement System (AES) is a combination of finely tuned myomer bundles and an enhanced DI computer interface that can improve the workings of a BattleMech's limbs. In many ways similar to the acuity enhancing servos and mechanisms tied into enhanced targeting computers, AES components serve to stabilize subtle variances in gross 'Mech movements, which can lead to greater weapon precision or improved balance adjustments. However, the systems are heavy and bulky.
